page.title: 07Bugbrooke Primary School
page.content: There are 358 pupils,14.6 teachers,2 peripatetic teachers(violin+ reading), 1 secretary,1 ancillary,1 cook+2 assis 5 dinner ladies,1 caretaker,3 cleaners. There are also back-up facilities from N.C.C.The school is split into 3 depts.,but it all feels one school. {Infants}(4+/7+)has 6classes -2 per yr.All have similar organization -children in groups of 5or6 who use a symbol key to move between work areas (Number,Lang.,Play or Craft).They work in all marked areas in a day. {Lower Jnr}(7+/9+)and{Upper Jnr(9+/11+) The children do Maths, Language etc, which is all centred around the topic work.A topic lasts a term so each Junior Dept. covers 6 topics. When children leave here they go to a comprehensive (in Bugbrooke) which takes children from many nearby villages.
